website_summaries.verdict: A large and easy to use kit that comes with a storage container, ideal for beginners with no supplies.
pros: 69-piece kit comes with a clear storage container to keep your items organized
Container has a handle for ease of transportation
Kit includes rhinestones, 3D nail decorations, french tip stickers, sequins, flakes, dotting tools and more
Easy to use tools are ideal for beginners
cons: The kit is smaller than some expected, but still gets the job done

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected but cute!
customer_reviews.text: This was a little smaller than I was expecting, but everything advertised was included in the package, and everything was clean and properly labeled and contained.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: A great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: My box was incomplete I’m missing all the round jewel cases the French tip stickers the sponges the separators and the stickers themselves and I only got one layer of the box which is supposed to have two I was REALLY EXCITED FOR THOSE MISSING JEWELS UPDATED: I received a BRAND NEW SET from the seller and it has everything inside its clean organized and I've used it now several times it's a great starter kit a big thankyou to the seller on the replacement 😁
customer_reviews.author: Xochitl.Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Cute decorative designs
customer_reviews.text: Don’t mind my horrible cuticles but these designs are so cute! Couldn’t stop staring all day !! Perfect price for the amount of stuff they give you. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Phan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It is good for the starter! I am so busy in working my own nails design now!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Tan

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality for the price. Not PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I think this is great for the price. But the quality isn’t perfect by any means. The glitter is chunky, some of the gems are misfigured a little, the sponges for ombré don’t work well, or maybe I’m just not doing it good enough. The dotting tools are great. The “foil flakes” are really chunky and not flexible so that’s worth noting. But all in all great for beginners in the nail industry like me
customer_reviews.author: TemptedNails

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Im a licensed nail tech and i buy all kinds of brands I like to try everything. The brushes and decals are good. The scissors were junk and didn't cut Foils or the tape or anything. The box itself is pretty flimsy and doesn't close or open easily and the little dividers dont work well. The box is the main reason I bought this so that was disappointing. I feel could have bought this stuff separately and paid alot less considering the quality of most the items. Wouldn't buy again but it's ok for beginners
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Low quality don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always enjoyed products from amazon but to get the product broken before using it is very disappointing. The only thing I enjoy in the box is the foil but even then the pieces are too big and definitely take a lot of other product to keep from looking frumpy on the nail. The box is smaller then expect and the rhinestones look super cheap and not much of them in the container for its price I don’t recommend. Won’t buy again
customer_reviews.author: Cela meza

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: Love this kit! It’s great for beginners such as myself.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Lachel

customer_reviews.title: My New Obsession
customer_reviews.text: This is a real bargain! Although no directions are enclosed, I'm very happy with everything that's included. Still figuring out what everything is & how it works but I'm learning with the help of tutorials on YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great value !!!! This stuff will last a long time
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I'm just gonna say the dotting pens alone is worth the buy. I was at Sally's yesterday and they had the exact same pen for 15 bucks for 1! You get 5 in this pack! I'm so happy with my purchase. I would recommend to others. I also thought it was bigger , but once you get into the box I felt like it was never ending lol. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Everything was very cheap. It looked used. Please don’t waste your money on this product
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Super tiny. Buy a bigger kit put it in your own box
customer_reviews.text: Super small I went in expecting it to be a small get seeing as you got a case with it as well. But I didn't expect in to fit in the palm of my hand it is tiny. Would be bad if it was for a smaller girl but as a gift for a teenager its kinda a joke. I could have paid less for a kit triple the size and put it in a box myself.
customer_reviews.author: Abrooka393

customer_reviews.title: Many things come in this box, but only a few of them do you truly want....
customer_reviews.text: Why did they feel the need to put so many random objects in this tiny box? Once you take everything out of its packaging, you will never be able to get it back into the box. There are items in there that I really don't know what the F to do with. Random stickers, none that you really want to apply to your nails for two whole weeks... It just doesn't seem to make sense to me. Yes. A lot of bang for your buck. Necessary? Absolutely not. Would I recommend? 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Returning customer disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this product, I run my own business and I've purchased from this company before, but this time, my entire package was just a disaster. There was sparkles everywhere and half of the product was unusable. I'm really upset about this. Most likely won't buy again. If my order is corrected, I'll update.
customer_reviews.author: kristen watkins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you love having flawless nails! 🥰
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter! It’s great comes with so much your nails will look flawless all the time! Best money spent my daughter has so much fun doing her nails now she goes around doing mine and our dogs nails also! It’s great and it comes in a box to keep everything nice and organized!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley crider

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: You get a lot of items but half of them are terrible quality. As a nail tech student, this seemed like a fun way to try new things before buying in bulk but most items are junk. Would be ok for a teen.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Comes with a lot. The foil is far too thick and tacky. Some parts can be cheap and meh. Also the carousel style packed rhinestones and gems get mixed up in the packaging. It’s good but not amazing. If you’re looking for something to do and have other nail kits and supplies it’s a good addition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste waste of money!!!
customer_reviews.text: This products doesnt even worth 10 dollars never ever buy this products its so cheap looking. Dont be fooled by the pictures and good reviews. Believe me its a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: The kit contains great nail art decorations and in colors that can be used in many different combinations. Lots of fun nail art potential, especially as a starting kit for someone who had basically no nail art tools and decorations. If I had to, my only gripe is that the packaging itself (the case, the containers the glitters are held in, etc.) feel like they'd break easily and are pretty stiff to open and close. Not affecting on the decorations themselves, but something to expect.
customer_reviews.author: Mary F.

customer_reviews.title: Good for teenagers.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, descent value. Some parts are dollar store but still will utilize. The case is pretty cheap but will do the trick. Hard to latch.
customer_reviews.author: KenSueCreative

customer_reviews.title: So much glittttttttttter!!!
customer_reviews.text: This kit has all the goodies for fun nail art. A great starter kit to give you a lot of options for designs all in a compact case you can organize as you wish. The toe seperaters are not made to last more than a few uses. They are more like the type they would send you of the salon with.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Super cute gift  for any nail artist  lover
customer_reviews.text: What a cute nail kit. This product is totally a great idea to give it a gift. It’s not too small nor too big but just the right size to store it anywhere. The kit gives a lot for the price. Totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, small container
customer_reviews.text: I put my hand over it to give you an idea of how big it is. A lot smaller than hoping for, despite the many reviews stating it’s small, I still hoped for bigger lol. Still a good buy. I didn’t use the dividers bc I wanted to put extra stuff in it. I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied by company
customer_reviews.text: Very nice items I was missing a few stickers and when I was contacted by company and made them aware they sent me so many free goods, will definitely buy more from this company just by how prompt and professional they serviced my concerns
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Valencia

customer_reviews.title: Not too good quality
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for something professional maybe this isn’t the right one for you. The stripping tape isn’t really good and doesn’t stay while you’re trying to use it. I think it’s cool for a teenager that wants to experiment with nails. The case is really bad quality and the stones too.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun & Love the case!
customer_reviews.text: So much to play with and you can make beautiful nails. Easy to use and the case helps if you need to be on the go. I am always surprised how much fits in the tiny case. I’m happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CaliforniaSpaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as image just box it a bit small
customer_reviews.text: Items r smaller then what i thought. The whole thing is cute simple everything was there nothing damaged. Had dividers inside so u can put them the way u would like them n remove when not needed. Love that they stack n clip together.
customer_reviews.author: Freddy

customer_reviews.title: Lots of stuff
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe all the awesome nail art things that it comes with. Everything in the picture!! Great for a start kit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have nail kit!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful.... I use something from this kit every week... amazing value and a staple for DIY nails that look like you had them done in a salon. I’m complemented on my nails all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Appiah Family

customer_reviews.title: You get each item for .36 cents.
customer_reviews.text: I got all 69 pcs along with my gift case box. I thought this supply case would be big and bulky but it’s small and cute. I can fit it into my drawer. Every item fits into it perfectly is a plus. Good quality supplies. I recommend this set and it’s price. I got each item for .36 cents. ❤️😊😊
customer_reviews.author: augielovesnunu

customer_reviews.title: Bummed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about receiving this item. As soon I received the item I noticed it came damaged. The box has cracks and will not connect. I have not yet counted or checked the other items to verify everything else is there or okay. I gave it three stars because the main part is broken.
customer_reviews.author: brianna

customer_reviews.title: this is a great affordable kit!
customer_reviews.text: I like this kit it has really cute gold stickers and some real nice glitters with a range of colors. Its totally worth it. Also comes with strips so you can do french tips that look amazing. And the tools to do nail design work really well. I definitely recommend this kit and it also comes in a clear container so you don't have to worry about storing all the iteam els were.
customer_reviews.author: RockinRobert

customer_reviews.title: Do not reccomend
customer_reviews.text: The holographic foils are just cut up pieces of colored plastic that dont really stick to your nails and make them very clumpy.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Deneen

customer_reviews.title: Good for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: The materials are good for beginners who are trying to experiment with nail art. The tools are good quality but the brushes were stiff. The glitter and gems were decent, but they are not that pretty. The wide array of colors allow for good experimentation. The quality is what you get for the cheap price. I did not receive stickers that were displayed in the pictures (that was a bit disappointing)
customer_reviews.author: Seahee Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've never heard of this brand before so this was actually a leap of faith! I really like a the fact that it has a bit of everything and you can create different designs on your nails. I feel for that the amount of products you get vs the price you pay is worth it. In addition, I think this is a very cute gift idea for friends who enjoy to get their nails done in a creative and original way! All in all, I'm glad I made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited to do my nails!!! I absolutely love everything in it!!! It’s just like what you would buy from a beauty supply store but not as expensive!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Stallings

customer_reviews.title: Great variety
customer_reviews.text: You get a lot of different products for great price no directions or instructions for guidance came with it lids can stick and be a little difficult to get off and on
customer_reviews.author: Donna Danenhower

customer_reviews.title: NO DO NOT USE YOUR MONEY ON THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, when I got the package several of the glitter packets where broken, and when I opened it it spilled out everywhere. The tools are very bad quality, I would definitely NOT recommend using this product. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Love the kit, but it came broken
customer_reviews.text: I love the contents of the kit - I have had some fun with nail art! But the box arrived cracked. I figured it wasn't worth sending back, so I just taped it. Otherwise all good - you get a lot in the kit!
customer_reviews.author: Alexcetera28

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, great value, awesome present 💝
customer_reviews.text: I love this little box😍It was really a surprise for me, I was not expecting this to come in an cute organizer 💖My husband told me that I looked like a little girl with a new toy!I did all my nails in different colors😬I also did my mom’s 😁
customer_reviews.author: Aniet Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Came slightly damaged but it did come all the way from China so that is to be expected. Overall, such a cute little set and I’m super excited to use it!
customer_reviews.author: lyzzie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: The items in this kit are very very low quality.
customer_reviews.author: Terraymar

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, cheap, oh yeah and the stuff in it sucks.
customer_reviews.text: Product sucks. The tape doesn’t stick, the stuff in it is cheap, the brushes are okay. Over all really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this product. The price was awesome. It is as seen as the picture. Everything came in the package and love the cute container to store all of the items. Thank You!!
customer_reviews.author: shan

customer_reviews.title: Nail Accessories & case
customer_reviews.text: This product is definitely amazing for the cost, so many different accessories and so many things to do. It was organized and everything was packaged in a nice neat way. The storage container came with dividers which is nice, and the small art brushes and dotting tools are awesome also. Great for beginners and also lots of options for making your nails or your clients nails looking fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay to used but u have to buy the glue separate🙄
customer_reviews.text: Like everything that comes with it but I wish they had the foil glue to comes with the set.
customer_reviews.author: tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for nail art beginners !!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is perfect for beginners of nail art ! Love this kit !! I recommend to anyone whose interested in nail art & designs ! Kit is loaded for variety of ideas !
customer_reviews.author: Allayne Clark

customer_reviews.title: Try another kit
customer_reviews.text: Box is very hard to close. Glitter is not as fine as in the pictures. The brushes are all the same size. Many of the decals are a bit dated. I wish adhesives were included to go with the gems. Only thing I’m really using are the tip stencils. Most everything else I’ve rebought.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Prigge

customer_reviews.title: Great way to play
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kit to be able to start doing nail art! Total bang for the buck. I absolutely love it and I have been getting so many compliments on my nails. I would absolutely buy again. The container is great for storing all the materials as well as a few of my nail clippers and stuff.
customer_reviews.author: M. Millward

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this deal I love this kid it has lasting me and hold year I love all the Glitters diamonds all the tools that are comes with is very useful I just love it I recommended the price is amazing it's 69 pieces for a low price it is so worth it love the cute little container that it comes in can be used for multiple things
customer_reviews.author: lynette

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pretty set
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! So much fun! There is a ton of items in the box and as a beginner at nail art I'm over the moon with the set. The plastic dividers were not cut correctly so they won't work in my box, but I wasn't planning on using them anyway. The rest of the package and the box itself was my priority.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Just eh
customer_reviews.text: Not the best but you get what you pay for! Very cute! I enjoyed unboxing, a lot of stuff is useable but the rhinestones have a dull shine. Eh.
customer_reviews.author: jessica harris

customer_reviews.title: Great value and lots of fun decorating tools!
customer_reviews.text: Love this kit! The container is cute, compact and durable for its size. The items included are great quality and easy to use! This is a great addition to my nail styling items!
customer_reviews.author: Kamryn

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! I’m just starting to do my own nails at home and I stumbled upon this while looking for glitter and everything is just like the picture. I can’t wait to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsi Turner

customer_reviews.title: Read the reviews,  it is not a large case.
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly what I was expecting. I read all the reviews first. It even came with the gold cast stickers that they show, which are adorable. I use the case to hold my holographic powders and such. Everything was in the package and it arrived a little quicker than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Fran M.

customer_reviews.title: As described.
customer_reviews.text: Was a little smaller than expecting but came with everything described works just perfect little hard to open but I'm just weak.
customer_reviews.author: Kisa Kotetsu

customer_reviews.title: Lots of stuff!
customer_reviews.text: The materials were awesome but the dividers for the box do not fit. If you slide them in the lids do not go on they are too tall
customer_reviews.author: SLlovin1

customer_reviews.title: Not the same size tote as the picture shows
customer_reviews.text: Very small I was expecting a big box as pictured, its tiny not worth 20$.
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER G

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money I gave it 4 stars because some of the stones were just very cheap
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Small but works
customer_reviews.text: The box is pretty small but I was fine with that. Only problem was that the glitters were spilled everywhere upon arrival
customer_reviews.author: Wendyy H.

customer_reviews.title: I likeeee.
customer_reviews.text: I love it i just wish that the holding container was more solid and firmer other than that its nice it comes with everything in the picture and description.
customer_reviews.author: nisha

customer_reviews.title: Recomend 100%
customer_reviews.text: This product is 5/5. It came with all the components and I love that you can store everything in the case. I have yet to play with everything but everything looks to be high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi C

customer_reviews.title: Who needs a salon anymore?
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a family member and she loves it! This entire kit was very easy to use and gave salon like results. I do recommend using a gel top polish and curing for longer lasting results but all in all, very nice compact nail kit!
customer_reviews.author: Richard & Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Good variety
customer_reviews.text: This pack has a good variety of tools and decorations. My granddaughter loved it.
customer_reviews.author: A. S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Everything in this is amazing. I use it for acrylics and I love encapsulating different things in them, and the glitter, foil, and rhinestones were perfect for that. The dotting tools, brushes, and tweezers were also great quantity for the price. The only thing I don't like is the patterns of the stickers and I find the toe separaters useless but that's just personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Imogene

customer_reviews.title: A lot to choose from
customer_reviews.text: At home do it myself nails person so I love this kit it’s wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Starting Set
customer_reviews.text: A great little starter set for those of us just starting to get into nail art. Gives you just enough to get started without getting lost. Everything came clean and as described.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Itzamna Vega

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute & Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: What a fun little kit!!! You get a lot of awesome stuff in here for such an affordable price and everything seems to be really good quality! Definitely recommend for some nail art fun!
customer_reviews.author: RyNoDK

customer_reviews.title: Great variety product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Variety of things to get started.
customer_reviews.author: Georgina Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet many options.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't wait to get this item. Being on bed rest their very few activities that I can do and painting my nails is something I enjoy doing. I had this kit in my cart for a week as I contemplated if it was worth the cost and I'm very pleased I made the purchase. This is a simple kit that provide many items for one to design and be creative.
customer_reviews.author: julia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this box has all you need to make your nails look Amazing beautiful. 100% satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product but a few things
customer_reviews.text: I received the item pretty much the next day, but I was pretty sad that the storage container that came with it was very small and flimsy. Some of the glitters got all over the box, but it was an easy cleanup. Overall, the accessories and supplies were great!
customer_reviews.author: Ghiezelle Lynn

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: You really get alot for your money, the products are so pretty and the tools are super nice, i honeslty just love all the art i can do on my nails now. As soon as i got the kit i couldnt wait to use it 💖
customer_reviews.author: marlee

customer_reviews.title: Good find
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately one of my dotters is arrived broken. There is a lot of stuff which is a plus, the quality of everything is fine for the most part. I wasnt impressed with the foil, the gold stickers are not cute and the tweezers dont work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Didn't come with everything
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with everything. Missing the dotting pens, brushes, tweezers, nail foil chip, nail glitter, and the tape. Very disappointed and I dnt think this is worth 20 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: kristi lord

customer_reviews.title: Nails
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My wife was very excited when she saw her nail art set. She has been wanting to learn how to d designs on her nails and this kit has everything she needs.
customer_reviews.author: Noel Bracamontes

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this kit
customer_reviews.text: Gems and kit very good love them enjoy using them
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Best for a child.
customer_reviews.text: Case is very difficult to close when dividers are in place. Contents, for the most part, are decent, considering the price. Would make a great gift for a 10 year old or something.
customer_reviews.author: Lina B

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: The container is flimsy! SMALL AS HELL!! Some of the rhinestones look very cheap! I guess you get what you pay for! A lot of items in box tho!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha mcbean

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding kit! My daughter and I are getting into the nail art trend and this is an excellent starter kit. It's got lots of fun things to use!
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Lots of options
customer_reviews.text: I love the glitter! And the gems. Fun for girls nights.
customer_reviews.author: Maria W

customer_reviews.title: IT'S SO CUTE!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and it is so cute!! very small and compact. Great product for your money. I just sent them an email to see where i can get add on detachable clear cases to add on to this one. since you can build on this case.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It has a lot of great tools and other things to make your nails look great. I gifted this to my cousin who is starting her nail business and she loved it. It’s a great starter
customer_reviews.author: LAURA ESPINOZA

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with my nails. The variety for the price of this kit is amazing. You get so much, and it's exactly as the pictures. I do have a crack in the plastic case it comes in but other than that it's a great buy. I also do my own acrylic work so the nail forms this kit comes with helped alot.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Using the dividers causes it not to stack right.
customer_reviews.text: Little but still cute. I'm barely learning so I need to get used to what's in the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Janeice Gayles

customer_reviews.title: Great product for fun nails
customer_reviews.text: Super fun for beginners, so many options for fun nails designs. Shipped super fast and everything was included. I love it. Definatly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Everything one needs for nails all in one kit!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this kit! It contains everything listed and it’s a very good buy for its price!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but okay.
customer_reviews.text: The materials and for the price, I’d say it was a good buy...with that being said, the storage box is very cheap plastic and I received it broken, so I am unable to use that and will need to purchase a container now. The products are good considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: jogerholdt

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: packaging container is nice and neat a little glitter fell inside of the box but that's ok. I just hope my daughter like it as much as i do.
customer_reviews.author: nadine

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Nice product It was a gift for my niece and she loved it
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: 100% worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea about what all was in the set. But my teen was over the moon about this gift. She kept pulling stuff out and telling me the separate values. Totally worth the money. And for anyone that Loves doing their own nails and designs!
customer_reviews.author: LRW

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use
customer_reviews.text: All kinds of cool stuff to do ur nails with. Thanks :)
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Wegscheid

customer_reviews.title: Instructions Needed
customer_reviews.text: If you have knowledge of using all types of enhancements for nails it’s a marvelous package. There are no instructions causing much thought, trial and error.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Roux

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have if you're into nail art, etc.! It has so much included, and it's easy to carry around. It's a great gift too. If you're a beginner, this will DEFINETLY be put to good use.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for it's so petite but so worth it
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Beasley

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I'm really getting into DIY nails at home versus the salon and high prices and this has taken my DIY level to the next level. I love it and would order again. You get a lot for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lana Artis

customer_reviews.title: love this
customer_reviews.text: had a lot of fun doing new things with my nails
customer_reviews.author: Donna Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Yaay
customer_reviews.text: Ive always wanted nail caviar and now thanks to amazon I have them thats fast shipping to
customer_reviews.author: Jureen Burley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product❤️
customer_reviews.text: The company sent me another kit and it was amazing. The kit was cleaner and the pieces are all there. They are in great condition. It was more than I could hope for. I encourage others to buy. They also have wonderful customer care/service.
customer_reviews.author: Mon'a

customer_reviews.title: As pictured! 10/10
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived prestige and as pictured! The small plastic bits found inside the case are meant to be used as dividers. LOVE this for nail art!
customer_reviews.author: Chad

product_meta.title: AIFAIFA 69PCS DIY Nail Art Tools Decoration Manicure Kit, Glitter Nail Rhinestones, Nail Sticker Decal, Nail Sequins, Ombré Sponge, Dotting Pen, Clean Brush, Nail Design Supplies Come with Gift Box
feature_bullets: Professional nail decorations kit: 5Pcs nail sticker decal, 5 sheets French tip stickers, 10Pcs nail striping Tape, 4 wheels nail rhinestones decoration and 3D nail art decoration, 12 boxes sequins, 12 boxes Chameleon Powder flakes
Basic tools set: 2Pcs toe separator, 8Pcs sponge, 1PC cleaning brush, 5Pcs dotting pen, 3Pcs liner Brush, 1PC pickup tweezers
A Clear Detachable Organizer: 5. 9"×5. 9"×3. 54"，2 layers, 12 detachable slots. You can also use it to store your lipsticks, nail polishes, accessories, jewelry, etc.
Easy to carry & store: see-through craft case with snap shut lid, and carry handle; semi-clear plastic
Beginners friendly: perfect tools for both professional nail technician and at home DIY nail lover. More details and usage method in the product description.
